arts.ttl: REACTION: Wigan Athletic boss on Mansfield Town FA Cup victory
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney admitted Thelo Aasgaard 'really came to the fore again' for Wigan Athletic as they advanced to the fourth round of the FA Cup with victory at Mansfield Town.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Mansfield Town 0 Wigan Athletic 2 - Thelo at the double sees Tics remain on Wembley trail
arts.sum: Two goals from talisman Thelo Aasgaard in the opening nine minutes of the second half saw Wigan Athletic advance to round four of the FA Cup – and a home tie against Premier League Fulham – thanks to a 2-0 victory at fellow League One outfit Mansfield Town.

arts.ttl: Thelo Aasgaard scores twice as Wigan set up Fulham tie
Wigan Athletic secure services of young goalkeeper
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic have secured the services of young goalkeeper Matteo Spinelli following a successful trial period.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss makes '50-50' admission over Liverpool loan star
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney has confirmed Luke Chambers' future at Wigan Athletic remains a coin toss at this stage.

arts.ttl: Former Wigan Athletic loan man returns to Scotland
arts.sum: Scotland international defender Calvin Ramsay has joined Kilmarnock on loan for the rest of the season following his recall from Wigan Athletic.
